title: New: Sweat – Stay
body:
London outfit **SWEAT** are closing out a mighty 2016 in style with the release of their fantastic new EP, Pink Love World through Meno Records.

Showcasing a diverse pallet of sounds, EP highlight _Stay_ is straight out the top draw of Jarvis Cocker-esque songwriting – taking almost a conversational tone, it manages to remain disarmingly romantic. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
